mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.no AS "no", a.name AS "name", a.expression AS "expression", a.isunique AS "isunique", a.last_flow_date AS "lastFlowDate", a.increassment AS "increassment", a.current_flow_no AS "currentFlowNo", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u9.name AS "createBy.name", u11.name AS "updateBy.name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_billcoder( id, no, name, expression, isunique, last_flow_date, increassment, current_flow_no, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{no}, #{name}, #{expression}, #{isunique}, #{lastFlowDate}, #{increassment}, #{currentFlowNo}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
